nodes.text: Magro Slim was a male Klatooinian who was affiliated with Eno Arba and Meeko Ghintee. In 32 BBY, he was wanted by Rozatta with a bounty of 1,500 credits alive and 750 dead for destroying many of the Outland Transit Station's lower level bathrooms. He was bounty was collected for 1,500 credits by Jango Fett who found him in the station's waste flow canal.
